The MakaHost.dll is a dll that checks for updates on the crack. Basically when the author of the crack updates his crack among with a new version of XSplit, it will check it and ask you for download. No need to worry about.
New crack version available,  it always try to connect amazon cloud 5 port's ...

@Lightning-kun I guess you are using Windows 8 ?Hide from Screen Region function does not work, for now, on Windows 8 since aero theme cannot be disabled.

i livestreamed with it, and its okay. but sometimes i get an error when i refocus on the program (ie i do something in firefox but then go back to xsplit) and its really annoying. and on 2 occasions, i installed it on friends' computers and they both acted up. (skype and teamviewer would start acting up) but it didnt happen for me. wonder why.
